message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it presents a great value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. However, $11,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you consider that?
